text: The Everybody’s Hungary People’s Party (Hungarian: Mindenki Magyarországa Néppárt, MMN) is a centre-right political party in Hungary. The party was founded by Péter Márki-Zay. == The Main Values of the Party == * Patriotism * Fairness * Transparency * Performance The party was created to have a conservative political force in Hungary that is committed to the change of the system. It aims to end corruption and stop irresponsible politics without a vision for the future. ==References== Category:Political parties in Hungary
title: Everybody's Hungary People's Party
